reviewText:
A favorite ballet score is roughly treated. Running time is approximately 20 minutes short. Several tempi are too fast, especially in the interludes and pantomime scenes.  Cuts are crude, leaving passages sounding thin and incomplete. However, the two principals are magnificent.

Some DVDs of this performance in the version for Region 1 (U.S. and Canada) are selling for around $300.  However, if you purchase this all region player (http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B004BI6MVS/ref=oh_details_o00_s00_i00) for about $55 you can play this $15 PAL DVD and other discs from multiple regions.
